news.title: Crime & Courts
news.author: Hannah Davis-Reid
news.body: On Friday, a jury unanimously ruled that Kirk Bangstad, owner of Minocqua Brewing Company, owes Lakeland Times owner Gregg Walker $750,000 for defamation.

news.body: The Merrill Fire Department said the fire had already spread to a significant portion of the home on Jefferson Street by the time fire crews arrived.
